summary: A reincarnated man unknowingly falls in love with his own daughter from his previous life. Once he realizes this, he tries to end their relationship before angels erase his memory.
cast: Cybill Shepherd|Robert Downey Jr.|Ryan O'Neal|Mary Stuart Masterson|Christopher McDonald|Josef Sommer|Joe Grifasi|Henderson Forsythe|Susan Ruttan|Lester Lanin|Richard DeAngelis|Franchelle Stewart Dorn|Jacquelyn Drake|Don Richards|June Thorne|Nat Benchley|Cliff McMullen|Carey Hauser|Laura Cordova|Max Trumpower|Dennis Mancini|Katie Schwarz|Margi Holland|Andrew Reilly|Fran Ryan|James Noble|Marc McClure|Mimi Kennedy|Kathleen Freeman|Dennis Patrick|Martin Garner|Gianni Russo|Channing Chase|Laura Caulfield|Gillian Doyle|Bettina M.
